title: Chris Gaskell
text: Chris Gaskell is a Senior Clinical Psychologist in Neuropsychology in the UK. When not working clinically he tends to been seen talking about his rescue dog (Leo) and making futile attempts at programming/web development.

title: Chris Gaskell
text:
Education
University of Sheffield, UK | DClinPsy in Clinical Psychology | Sept 2018 - Sept 2021
University of Chester, UK | BSc in Psychology | Sept 2010 - Sept 2013

title: Chris Gaskell
text:
Experience
NHS | Senior Clinical Psychologist | August 2022 - present
IndigoNeuro | Associate Psychologist | August 2020 - present
North West Neurotherapeutics | Associate Psychologist | August 2023 - present

title: NeuroPsyTools
text:
If you like the resources, then please share! If you have something you would like to see included on NeuroPsyTools then please contact us.
Tweet
This is a website devoted to collecting resources for those working in clinical neuropsychology.
The website is currently divided into into Apps and (External) Resources - watch this space for future pages!
